Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.settings

Class Option<TValue>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.settings.Option<TValue>
Type Parameters:
TValue - The type of the option value, if required.
Direct Known Subclasses:
AutoOption, FixedPortOption, HelpOption, LimitOption, RmiOption, RmiPortOption, SocketPortOption, TuiOption, VerbosityOption
public abstract class Option<TValue> extends Object
Represent a command line option. Any option has a short flag (e.g. "-h") and a long flag (e.g. "--help"), and can require a value.
